Values.Cognitive:SearchEndpoint: ---the URL of your cognitive search endpoint (e.g., https://[name-you-choose].search.windows.net)---
Values.Repository:GremlinDatabaseConnectionStri: --a Gremlin connection...WARNING: the one from the portal is missing the database name so you need to add it (see comments in RepositorySettings.cs or readme.md for more info)---
Values.Repository:GremlinHostName: ---your host name minus any https prefix (e.g., mystuff.gremlin.cosmos.azure.com) here--
